Dear Parent


This is to bring to your attention that your Child ${object.student_id.name} was involved in a fight on ________ with a fellow student in school which is against the school rules.


In view of the serious nature of the issues, the school administration requires you to accompany your child to school on ${object.meeting_datetime} to discuss this matter further with administration.


Hoping for your full co-operation.


Yours faithfully,

Dear Parent


This is to bring to your notice that your Child ${object.student_id.name} Class ${object.course_id.name} was caught handed copying in the Mid-Term II, [Date] [Class] [Subject] Examination.


We feel that this is a serious offence which is against the school policy bearing in mind that as a young student he/she should display good character.


You are therefore asked to accompany your son/daughter to school on ${object.meeting_datetime} to discuss this issue with the administration.


Hoping for full co-operation from your end.


Yours faithfully,

Dear Parent


This is to bring to your attention that your Child ${object.student_id.name} Class ${object.course_id.name} has been involved in a boy - girl relationship which has been affecting his concentration in class.


we feel that this a serious offence which is against the school policy bearing in mind that as a young student he/she should display good character.


You are therefore asked to accompany your child to school on ${object.meeting_datetime} to discuss the matter with the administration. Both parents have to be present.


Hoping for your full co-operation.


Yours faithfully,

Dear Parent


This is to bring to your notice that your Child ${object.student_id.name} Class ${object.course_id.name} [REASON] on [DATETIME] inspite of having been reminded over this matter on several occasions.


It is the school policy that every student has to be in [REASON]. This is to ensure proper discipline in maintained in the school.


Therefore, you are kindly requested to come to school accompanied by your child on ${object.meeting_datetime} in order to discuss this matter with the administration.


Hoping for a favourable response and thanking you in anticipation.


Yours faithfully,

Dear Parent


In reference to rules and regulations of the school as laid down by the school board of governors on the matter of electronics, I would like to bring to your attention that your Child ${object.student_id.name} Class ${object.course_id.name} was caught in possession of an electronic gadget which is against the set school rules and regulations.


We feel this is a serious matter and you are therefore requested to accompany your Child to school on ${object.meeting_datetime} to discuss this issue further with the administrators.


Looking forward to your co-operation.


Yours faithfully,

Dear Parent


This is to bring to your attention that your Child ${object.student_id.name} Class ${object.discipline_id.course_id.name} has been given suspension effective from ${object.suspend_from_date} until ${object.suspend_to_date}.


The school administration arrived at this decision after your child was grossly involved in ${object.misbehaviour_category_id.name} within the school compound. This is a serious offense which is even banned by government.


You are therefore asked to ensure that you guide and counsel your child during the suspension period. You are further asked to accompany you child back to school on ${object.suspend_to_date} to allow your child resume studies.


Yours faithfully,
